metadata.name: BORDO
metadata.description:
What could be more important than movement in all aspects of life?
Ballet is movement, plasticity, grace, and tremendous self-discipline and hard work.
Ballet is a great art form, outwardly fragile, gentle, but strong in spirit. Â I admire these people, it is the inner strength and solemnity and it can not help but inspire .
My studies at the Academy in the department of sacred and monumental painting influenced all my work.  My Ballerinas are painted in a unique color scheme, earthy colors combined with the glow of gold.
I am inspired by the plasticity of the body, it is an image of a divine person in whom everything is beautiful, both physical and spiritual.
The art of spiritualized plasticity, a thought embodied in movement.
NFT 6000/12000 
Art 1200/600mm (48/24 inch)
Oil on canvas Mixed technique
One unique work of art 1/1
